    • Uses of Function in jsat.text.wordweighting

      Classes in jsat.text.wordweighting that implement Function 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BinaryWordPresent
      Provides a simple binary representation of bag-of-word vectors by simply marking a value 1.0 if the for is present, and 0.0 if the word is not present.
      class  TfIdf
      Applies Term Frequency Inverse Document Frequency (TF IDF) weighting to the word vectors.
      class  WordWeighting
      WordWeighting is an index function specifically mean for modifying the values of a vectors used for a bag-of-words representation of text data.
